idea:
ReeBorn TotalHealth & DigiTech Private Limited is a new age healthcare and digital therapeutics company focussed on the following mission:

a) Prevention and reversal of chronic lifestyle diseases such as Diabetes, Hypertension & Obesity, which are increasing exponentially in India as well as globally.

b) Early detection, prevention, and treatment of complications of chronic lifestyle diseases such as Heart Attacks, Strokes, Kidney Failures, Blindness, Amputations. etc.

c) Provide the best possible medical & healthcare for early detection, prevention, reversal, and treatment of chronic lifestyle diseases and their complications.

The Company will achieve the above mission using the approaches given below.

A) Innovative Healthcare Technology Solutions

B)Better Outcomes for Patients

C)Insights Driven & Evidence-Based Care

D)Continuous Patient Education

E)Highly Engaging Experiences

F)Data-Driven Personalised

Treatment
name: REEBORN TOTALHEALTH & DIGITECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Optimoney technologies private limited runs and operates ‘PocketATM’, a platform that aspires to redefine and revolutionise the cash ecosystem in India by building a QR technology-led interface with seamless backward integration & unparalleled customer experience.

 

The PocketATM platform will work towards achieving critical objectives like digitisation of the existing cash ecosystem, building utility tools to enable efficient cash management, enabling tailor-made credit solutions for the mom & pop stores & ensuring utmost security, seamless experience & strong customer support throughout user association.
name: OPTIMONEY TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
The Category


D2C FMCG market is expected to touch $20 Bn in India by 2025. Gourmet and speciality grocery is a new concept in India, but is estimated to be $150 Bn or 16% of total grocery in the USA.


The Consumer


Affluent millennial consumers are digitally savvy, convenience seeking and have experienced at-least one minor health issue either themselves or with someone around them.


1. They are willing to try healthy products but unwilling to compromise on taste


2. They lean towards familiar concepts which can be adapted into regular routines.


The Offering


Our range of gourmet direct to consumer products are based on familiar, trusted ingredients and timeless concepts. Each product is rooted either in a heritage cuisines or a trusted ingredient (Jaggery, Ginger) or a popular historical identity.


Core categories encompass spreads, confectionery, condiments and snacks. Core channels include social commerce and grocery delivery partners.


The Opportunity


We estimate 2% of top digitally savvy households are already looking for specialty gourmet grocery - yielding 200,000 consumers. We expect this segment to spend at-least Rs 2500/- ($35) per month on premium grocery products and generate INR 600 Cr ($82 MM) sales annually.
name: Veteris Foods Private Limited
